data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 20,607 believers in the state of Islas de la Bahía to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Islas de la Bahía, Honduras
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 20,607 believers in Islas de la Bahía that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Islas de la Bahía.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Islas de la Bahía, Honduras to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Turk people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Islas de la Bahía to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Islas de la Bahía words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the state of Islas de la Bahía, Honduras has a population of 75,000.

We estimate Islas de la Bahía has 20,607 people who might know Jesus, 51,166 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,227 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 75,000 people living in Islas de la Bahía, Honduras. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Islas de la Bahía
location.cities_list: Coxen Hole, French Harbor, Guanaja, Sandy Bay, Savannah Bight
